title: AB de Royse777
author: AB de Royse777
created_time: September 25, 2023, 06:15:21 PMLast edit: October 05, 2023, 05:30:01 AM by Royse777
content: /]ABOUT THE CAMPAIGN/][banned mixer] is a bitcoin mixing service that allow you stay anonymous! They will have a signature campaign on Bitcointalk very soon. For the signature campaign we need signature design. [banned mixer] management is looking forward to an exceptional creative design. To find the best design, we are launching this Signature design contest. Feel free to join. You will receive reward even for a minimum of one valid entry. The first winner will receive $300 and a Lifetime Discount of 50% to use [banned mixer] service.REWARD1st Prize : $300 + Lifetime Discount 50%2nd and 3rd Prize : Lifetime Discount 40%10% Lifetime Discount to each member for joining with a minimum one valid entry...DEADLINE..Before 1st October 2023 @ 23:59 UTCTO DO- Design a set of signature from Member rank to Legendary, submit the preview image. TERMS- Design must have empty space covered so that in the small screen the signature does not break to a new line- To be eligible for 10% Lifetime discount you will need to be at-least a Member rank forum user.- You can enter with as many set as you want. Do not edit the post once it is submitted.- You must apply with a Bech32 address. - Discount Code will be sent via PM after the contest*. - Kindly submit your entry within the assigned deadline, or your entry will be rejected.- The [banned mixer] team and I reserve the right to reject any application, any payment, including design.- Enrolling with more than one account is not allowed. Any accounts found in violation will be tagged.- No copy/paste, stealing others concept is permitted; if found, you will be banned and taggedHOW TO ENTER THE CONTEST: Post the following information.Code:Bitcointalk Rank:Bech32 address:[img]<Your Design Preview URL>[/img]Please strictly follow the submission format.When you apply you automatically agree that : ..Transferring the discount code that you receive to third parties and their subsequent generations is prohibited...📣This campaign is designed and managed by:General Disclaimer: We would like to make it clear that 💹📈 Bitcointalk Campaign Management 💪🔥 Signature & Bounty, managed by Bitcointalk member Royse777, is an independent entity and is not directly affiliated with any of the crypto startups we advertise. While we strive to promote these startups in the best possible light, our views and opinions expressed in our advertising materials do not necessarily reflect those of the startups themselves. We work with various clients across the crypto industry, and our goal is to provide high-quality advertising services to help them achieve their marketing objectives.Payment Disclaimer: Please always check the escrow wallet (if available). If the escrow wallet does not have enough balance and you think you have risk not to get paid then discontinue from the campaign. We are not liable to pay you anything that is not available on the escrow wallet.

comments.author: xLays

comments.body: For those who want to participate and are having a hard time creating ASCII art for the logo of [banned mixer], feel free to use my ASCII art that I created. You can enhance it if you think it is far from the design of the logo. No hard feelings. Looking forward to see your submission bud

comments.author: famososMuertos
comments.body: Quote from: xLays on September 26, 2023, 04:14:18 AM...//...I don't want to post the Preview, do it your own.   ...//...I have had the fortune of participating in avatar design and other art things that are given in the forum, without naming anyone, so as not to give spoilers and the point is that I do it because I like it.Then, a certain way it gives creative experience to my skills, that in the very fact of having them or not at a competitive level, what counts is that you do it because you feel it, you want to do it, then the judge or judges use their objective perspective, which has that definition for them, but subjective for everyone else except the winner, There is a BBcode viewer, well, there are several but I have seen how your "project" looks, you have to practice more, well you know my comment is subjective.https://codebeautify.org/bbcode-viewerI have used https://talkimg.com to upload this image.OP; Sorry for the "semi" off-topic.

comments.author: examplens
comments.body: Quote from: famososMuertos on September 28, 2023, 03:53:28 PMThere is a BBcode viewer, well, there are several but I have seen how your "project" looks, you have to practice more, well you know my comment is subjective.There is no need for an additional BBcode viewer, it is enough to enter the code in a regular post, and if you do not want to publish a post (as I am doing now), the Preview option is also sufficient.Otherwise, by my standards, what xLays did is quite good          ▄▄██▀▀██▄▄▄         ▄▄▄████▄▄▄        ▄█▀       ▀▀███▄ ▄▄██▀▀  ▄▄█▀▀▀▀█▄        █             ▄███▄     █▀▀      ██        ██         ▄█▀    ▀██▄█▀         ██▄         █▄     ▄█▀         ▄███▄       ████       ▄▄████████▄▄▄▄      █▀  ▀██▄   ███▀ █▄    ▄█▀    ▀▀█▀     ▀▀▀██▄█      ▀██ ████  ██    ▀█▄    ███▄         ▄█▀▀▀█▄▄   ▀██▀   ██      ▀█▄ █▀  ▀█▄      ▄█▀     ▀▀███▀█▄   ██        ▀██      ██▄  ▄█▀      ▄██▀█▄ ██ ▄█         ██        ▀███▀    ▄██▀▀    █████         ▀██         ▀██▄███▀         ██▀          ▀██▄▄▄▄▄▄██████ ▀██▄▄▄▄▄▄▄██▀            ▀███▀▀▀  █▀         ▄███▀               ▀███████████████▀▀

comments.body: The thread is locked now until we have a winner.Thanks you all for joining the contest.

comments.author: tumbler.io
comments.body: Heya, designers!Time to spill the beans on the Signature Design Contest. Man, choosing was tough with all those killer designs!🥇 jayce, take a bow! 1st spot, $300, and a fat 50% lifetime discount. Rock on!🥈 xLays, you're on fire! Snagged the 2nd spot and 40% off for good.🥉 And not forgetting rat03gopoh, 3rd place with a neat 40% discount. High five!Huge thanks to everyone who jumped in. All of you are bagging a 10% lifetime discount.Cheers!

comments.author: jayce
comments.body: Quote from: [banned mixer] on October 10, 2023, 10:19:54 AMHeya, designers!Time to spill the beans on the Signature Design Contest. Man, choosing was tough with all those killer designs!🥇 jayce, take a bow! 1st spot, $300, and a fat 50% lifetime discount. Rock on!...Huge thanks to everyone who jumped in. All of you are bagging a 10% lifetime discount.Cheers!Thank you, [banned mixer]! It was a tense contest and you are really offering generous prizes here. I wish all the best to you and your project man, good luck for the campaign! I'll arrange the code and deliver it to Royse. To all of the participants, it's great to see you join the contest. Those submissions really made me nervous. Good luck and see you again in the next tournament! And thanks to Royse as well for creating sig contest multiple times. Hopefully we could see another one in future
